song.englishname: Here's A Quarter (Call Someone Who Cares)

english.segment1: You say you were wrong to ever leave me alone. Now you're sorry, you're lonesome and scared. And you say you'd be happy if I you could just come back home. Well, here's a quarter, call someone who cares
english.segment2: Call someone who'll listen, or might give a damn. Maybe one of your sordid affairs. But don't you come 'round here handin' me none of your lies. Here's a quarter, call someone who cares
english.segment3: Girl, I thought what we had could never turn bad. So your leavin' caught me unaware. But the fact is you've run..girl, that can't be undone. So here's a quarter, call someone who cares
english.segment4: Call someone who'll listen, or might give a damn. Maybe one of your sordid affairs. But don't you come 'round here handin' me none of your lies. Here's a quarter, call someone who cares
english.segment5: Yeah, here's a quarter, call someone who cares
